name: RUN (itch) (Team Three)
description: RUN is a two to four player competitive platformer game. When playing RUN, players will race in procedurally generated levels trying to pull ahead of their competitors. The winner of a race is the one who leaves their opponents in the dust. Once a player wins a certain number of races (chosen ahead of time by the players), that player wins the set. Based on their performance in the set, players can unlock cosmetic customization items to personalize their very own runner. With customization options tied to particular profile, friends will be able to show off to each other the trophies of their own personal victories.
